Text: Once again thanks ZZW1983 you make an old pensioner very happy

Even after this update the game seems to suffer from the coupling bug, which makes several RW2 scenarios unplayable. E.g. in the Polmadie Hop scenario on WCML North route you can shunt the Class 86 locomotive to the southern end of the train, but you cannot couple your Class 47 to the other end of the train. In addition, the windshield wipers are working only for the front cab, which is a real nuisance in that scenario.Q
